io.micronaut.aot.core.sourcegen

Class AbstractSourceGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.aot.core.sourcegen.AbstractSourceGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AOTSourceGenerator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSingleClassFileGenerator, AbstractStaticServiceLoaderSourceGenerator, ApplicationContextConfigurerGenerator, ConstantPropertySourcesSourceGenerator, EnvironmentPropertiesSourceGenerator, GraalVMOptimizationFeatureSourceGenerator, KnownMissingTypesSourceGenerator, PublishersSourceGenerator, SealedEnvironmentSourceGenerator, YamlPropertySourceGenerator

    public abstract class AbstractSourceGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AOTSourceGenerator
    Base class for source generators which need access to the generation context (for example to get a handle on the analyzed application classloader, or to register resources to be excluded from the final binary).
